turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want to place an order for pickup from Bella Luna pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three large pizzas, thin crust, two of them extra cheese, one of them Meat Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: could you read that order over again please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, three large thin crust pizzas. Two with extra cheese, one meat lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, thanks. you said 3 large pizzas, all with thin crust, 2 extra cheese and 1 meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $36.49 is the total for your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted what you wanted. it'll be freshly baked and ready to go in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. I look forward to my pizza. Thank you.
